QuestData.Title: Back in One Piece
QuestData.Description: Yeah yeah, I'm sure Felora wants you back. That woman has no respect for innovation. When I told her about the modifications I was making for my Earth Elemental, she nearly threw a fit.$B$BGo tell her everything's all well and dandy. And tell her she's not getting a share of my inevitable fortune either.$B$BShe probably likes sleeping on the rock anyway.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Felora Firewreath in Silver Tide Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: Sam's in one piece then? And his poor assistant Felice? Good to hear.$B$BI hope that one day he'll learn to respect the elements as more than just a tool.
